content.chorus:
Onye Nwe anyi n 'akpo, unu bu
ndi enyi ya Ndi kwere n 'aya, Ndi di Ngozi (DC)
O si unu;
Bianu, Bia nara nu m rie, Bia nara m nuo,
ka m birin 'ime unu ka unu biri n 'ime m.
verses:
Onye nwe anyi n'akpo,
unu bu ndi enyi Ya
ndi kwere naYa,
Ndi di ngozi (Repeat)

Abu m achicha,
Nke si n'igwe bia,
Nke n'enye ndu ebebe,
Nri ndi oma.

Onye riri ahu m,
Na etoghi eto,
Maraonwe ya ikpe,
Nyocha obi gi.

Nri nke ndi muo-oma,
Ka O nyere madu,
Ndi bu ndi enyiYa,
Ndi di aso.

Were obi onu gawa,
Jee nara Jesu,
Nri nke n'enye ndu,
Nri mkpur'obi.

Mek'Okwukwe ms'ike,
Dika okwute, ka m kwes'ike oge nile
ndu m.

Dinwenu m ekwere m,
Ekwere ms'ike,
Na gi bu Chukwu no, na Eucharistia.

Dinwenu me ebere,
Ka in nata gi,
Oge niile, n'oge iku ume onwu.

Kwe ka m soro ndi nso nke Gi
N'eto Nna, nwa na Muo Nso
Na ndu ebighebi.
